column1: #Text=I great intelligent and funny read by the author once again, but I think she exceeded her own high standards this time.
#Text=Loved her writing...Unfortunately, it seems to get lost on most posters who only see this as a great chance to pile on Apple as if Apple is the only one who does this.
#Text=She could have written about many companies and achieved the same goal.
#Text=It's not about Apple people - it's about us.
